data.description: MKTNews Morning Bid - US - Amazon's stock surged 13% after the company reported hotter-than-expected earnings and revenue growth of 20% in its cloud business. The e-commerce giant also hiked its capital expenditures guidance for 2025 to $125 billion and said

data.title: The Gala by We Are All Human honors Latino leaders with Cirque du Soleil, honorees include Gabriel de Alba, Rita Ferro, Dr. Ellen Ochoa, and Bret Stephens.
data.description: In New York on October 31, 2025, the We Are All Human Foundation hosted its fifth annual Gala. The event honored notable individuals, including business visionary Gabriel de Alba, marketing leader Rita Ferro, astronaut Dr. Ellen Ochoa, and journalist Bret Stephens. This gala recognized their significant contributions in their respective fields.

data.title: NexGold completes C$112.5M bought deal private placement for units and flow-through shares.
data.description: The latest report states that there has been a significant increase in the unemployment rate, rising from 4.5% to 6.2%. This equates to over 1.4 million more people out of work. Additionally, the country's GDP has dropped by 8.9%, marking the largest decline in over a decade. This economic downturn has led to a record number of business closures, with over 75,000 companies shutting down permanently. The government has announced a new stimulus package of $2.3 trillion in an effort to revive the economy.

data.title: Dexcom stock fell 13% due to a cautious outlook despite a strong third-quarter report. Market sentiment turned negative.
data.description: Shares of Dexcom experienced a significant drop of 13% following a third-quarter report that was generally positive, but investors were concerned about the company's cautious outlook. This decline impacted Dexcom stock, leading to a notable decrease in its market value. Investors were expecting a more optimistic forecast, which contributed to the stock's decline. The company's performance in the third quarter was solid, but the cautious outlook overshadowed these results. This news was highlighted in an article on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: President Trump emphasizes critical mineral development, boosting coal stock's rally by 200%.
data.description: President Trump is emphasizing the importance of developing critical minerals. A recent deal involving rare earths is expected to further boost the 200% rally of a coal stock.

data.title: AbbVie surpasses Q3 forecasts with 47% growth in immunology segment, despite slight stock dip.
data.description: Early on Friday, AbbVie experienced a slight decrease, despite exceeding third-quarter expectations with its immunology medications. The company's immunology segment witnessed a significant growth of 47%.

data.title: Chevron and Exxon Mobil report profit decline in Q3, one narrowing gap, revenue announced before market open.
data.description: Prior to the stock market open on Friday, Chevron and Exxon Mobil released their third-quarter financial results. Both companies reported a decline in earnings and revenue for the quarter. However, one of the supermajors is showing signs of narrowing this gap. Investors are closely monitoring Chevron and Exxon Mobil's performance, with Chevron having reported a revenue of $38.12 billion, a decrease from the previous quarter, while Exxon Mobil reported a revenue of $46.2 billion. These results indicate the ongoing challenges faced by the companies in the current market conditions.

Zelenskyy: Today, the work of the institutions responsible for Ukraine's sanctions policy was summarized. During a meeting with journalists, they spoke about the results achieved and the impact of this work that Russia is already feeling and will feel even more in the future.

data.title: Maybank teams up with BNP Paribas and Marketnode to release tokenized money market fund for more transparent investment.
data.description: In a strategic partnership, Maybank has joined forces with BNP Paribas and Marketnode to introduce a new tokenized money market fund. This collaboration aims to boost transparency and make investment products more accessible to a wider audience. The initiative is set to revolutionize the market with advanced technology and user-friendly features. Investors can expect a seamless experience as they tap into this innovative fund. Together, the trio is poised to make a significant impact on the financial industry.

data.title: CAE to release Q2 financial results on Nov 11, 2025, with conference call on Nov 12 at 8:00 a.m. Open to analysts and investors.
data.description: On October 31, 2025, CAE (NYSE: CAE) (TSX: CAE) announced that the company will disclose its financial results for the second quarter of the fiscal year on Tuesday, November 11, 2025, after the market closes. A conference call will be held for analysts and institutional investors on Wednesday, November 12, starting at 8:00 a.m.

data.title: Audrain Motor Week and Broad Arrow Auctions announce a strategic partnership, establishing Broad Arrow's exclusive Northeast presence and solidifying Audrain as the region's premier automotive destination.
data.description: Broad Arrow, a subsidiary of Hagerty, has secured its exclusive foothold in the Northeast region as Audrain further cements its status as the leading automotive hub. This move reinforces Broad Arrow's dominance in the area and enhances Audrain's reputation as the go-to destination for automotive enthusiasts.

data.title: Capricor Therapeutics will present Q3 2025 financial results and corporate update on Nov 10, 2025. Conference call at 4:30 p.m. ET.
data.description: The company has scheduled a conference call for November 10, 2025, at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time (ET). Investors and stakeholders are invited to join the call to discuss important matters related to the company's operations and performance. This conference call presents an opportunity for individuals to gain insights and ask questions about the company's developments. Participants can dial in at the specified time to engage in this interactive session. It is advised to mark this date and time on the calendar for those interested in the company's updates.
FLSmidth & Co. A/S reports major shareholder update, with significant ownership stake disclosed.

data.title: AutoNation board approves buying $1 billion more of its stock.
data.description: Fort Lauderdale, Florida - On October 31, 2025, AutoNation, Inc. (NYSE: AN), a leading automotive retailer in the U.S., disclosed its plan to repurchase up to an extra $1 billion worth of AutoNation's common stock. The company's Board of Directors sanctioned this initiative. This move aims to enhance shareholder value and signify confidence in AutoNation's financial standing and growth prospects.

data.title: Trump's coal push stirs debate on Navajo Nation. Coal jobs vs. climate impact - jobs, economy at stake.
data.description: Coal, serving as a vital economic force in the region, has provided substantial employment opportunities. However, its extraction has significantly depleted water resources, deteriorated air quality, and sparked health-related worries among the community.

data.title: Eos Energy receives 228 MWh order from Frontier Power under 5 GWh agreement, hitting final Cerberus milestone. Strengthening partnership for energy storage deployment.
data.description: A recent order has bolstered a burgeoning partnership aimed at implementing long-duration energy storage solutions in various markets. This move marks a significant step forward in the collaboration between the two entities, highlighting the increasing focus on deploying energy storage capabilities. The order signifies a commitment to expanding the use of long-duration energy storage technologies, with the potential to address energy needs in multiple sectors. This development underlines the momentum behind the partnership and the growing interest in leveraging such solutions across different markets to enhance energy storage efficiency.

data.title: eMazzanti Technologies urges SMBs to implement Dark Web Monitoring due to rising cyber threats targeting them.
data.description: In Hoboken, New Jersey, on October 31, 2025, a notable rise in Cyberattacks aimed at small- and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) has been observed. eMazzanti Technologies, a top IT services and cybersecurity solutions provider, is emphasizing the importance of companies adopting Dark Web Monitoring solutions to combat this trend.
